Texts.Eng: Access a weapon with ease by ^#71f2f6;placing it in one of the action bar slots^white; at the top of the screen, then ^#71f2f6;pressing the corresponding number key to equip^white; or unequip it.
Good morning graduate! You have overslept. ^#71f2f6;Press A or D to get out of bed^white;.
I have bypassed the preflight checks. Get aboard!
It appears the ceiling has collapsed. The Matter Manipulator can be used to clear this dirt. ^#71f2f6;Press the R key to equip it^white;, then click and hold on the pile of dirt to dig through it.
It is not safe to remain here! ^#71f2f6;Please take the Matter Manipulator^white;. You must proceed to the shuttle pad!
Remember, you can open a door by ^#71f2f6;hovering over it with your cursor and pressing E^white;.
Scans show the room beyond this door has flooded. It would be best not to go in... I advise you find a way over it - ^#71f2f6;use spacebar to jump^white; up to higher platforms.
Take the Matter Manipulator dropped by the Grand Protector - it will be essential to your survival!
The chest sitting on that conveyor belt should contain some kind of weapon. Please arm yourself!
The scale of this disaster is immeasurable; the destruction occurring is beyond my capacity to quantify. You must leave this planet immediately.
To interact with a nearby person, door, or other object, you should ^#71f2f6;hover over it with your cursor and press E^white;, if you are awake enough to do so.
To jump down from a platform like this you should ^#71f2f6;hold S to crouch then tap spacebar^white;.
We are running out of time. I advise that you drop down through this platform by ^#71f2f6;holding S to crouch, then tapping spacebar^white;.
You can get past this dirt using your Matter Manipulator. ^#71f2f6;Press the R key to equip it^white;.
You will need to destroy that tentacle in order to reach the shuttle. I suggest you retrieve a weapon from that chest.
Your uniform is available to collect from your personal locker... It is quite impressive that you can remain so serene when you are running so late. Well done you.
